name: Surge (itch) (Billythekidzz, samdixonmusic)
description:
DOWNLOAD THE EXE FOR A BETTER EXPERIENCE

"When we hit our lowest point, we are open to the greatest change."
- Avatar Aang

Rise from the brink of death and surge through the raging currents.
Created for Kiwijam 2020 with the theme "ON THE BRINK".


Controls:
WASD or Arrow keys - Movement
WASD or Arrow keys + SPACE - Dash
The  dash energy bar is located at the bottom left of the screen.

Credits:

Music and Sound effects: samdixonmusic

Art and programming: Billythekidzz


Tips and Tricks:

When you are "on the brink" of death,  your energy recovers faster, you move faster and your dash covers more distance. Use this to your advantage!

Your dash energy will not recover unless you're on the brink of death. Take some risks to recover your energy.

Obstacles do not regenerate once they have been destroyed, so you'll eventually be able to complete the game.

If you don't think you can navigate past an obstacle, dash into it.
